meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Erik Johnson Sara Nies Deirdre Thomas Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7786.

td.p: Erik Johnson, a packaging engineer from Plymouth, Minnesota
Sara Nies, an editorial assistant from New York, New York
Deirdre Thomas, an attorney and editor from Seattle, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,399)

tr.td: 4 RINGS, SERKIS
SHE CREATED HIM
COMIC-CONVERSATION
GET "OUT"!
REVOLUTION NOW!
BUT IT'S LUNCHTIME
